external_games.name: Microsoft Train Simulator: German Railroads Volume Two: Fast Railcars on the Runway

name: Microsoft Train Simulator: German Railroads Volume Two - Fast Railcars on the Runway
summary: German Railroads Volume Two is an add-on for Microsoft Train Simulator which features the rail line in Germany between Munster to Bremen known as "the runway", due to it's traffic flow. This is described as 170km of main line to travel on. The game features the logos and licenses of German Federal Railways which operate along the route.
